dta.Scenario¶

class Scenario(startTime=Time(0, 0), endTime=Time(23, 0))¶

Bases: object

Class that represents a DTA Scenario, and all that it entails.

Constructor of a Scenario.

Parameters:
  • startTime (a dta.Time instance) – the start time of the scenario.
  • endTime (a dta.Time instance) – the end time of the scenario.
__init__(startTime=Time(0, 0), endTime=Time(23, 0))¶

Constructor of a Scenario.

Parameters:
  • startTime (a dta.Time instance) – the start time of the scenario.
  • endTime (a dta.Time instance) – the end time of the scenario.

Methods

__init__([startTime, endTime]) Constructor of a Scenario.
addEvent(eventTime, eventDescription) eventTime is a datetime.datetime instance and description is a string.
addVehicleClass(vehicleClassName) vehicleClassName is a string
addVehicleClassGroup(vehicleClassGroup) vehicleClassGroup is a VehicleClassGroup object
addVehicleType(vehicleType) vehicleType is a VehicleType
getVehicleClassGroup(vehicleClassGroupName) Returns the relevant VehicleClassGroup or throws a DtaError if not
iterVehicleClassGroups() Return an iterator to the vehicle class group items
iterVehicleClassNames() Return an iterator to the vehicle classes
maxVehicleLength() Returns the maximum vehicle length, in VehicleType.LENGTH_UNITS
addEvent(eventTime, eventDescription)¶

eventTime is a datetime.datetime instance and description is a string.

Verifies that eventTime is in [startTime, endTime)

addVehicleClass(vehicleClassName)¶

vehicleClassName is a string

addVehicleClassGroup(vehicleClassGroup)¶

vehicleClassGroup is a VehicleClassGroup object

addVehicleType(vehicleType)¶

vehicleType is a VehicleType

events = None¶

event time (datetime.datetime) -> description string

getVehicleClassGroup(vehicleClassGroupName)¶

Returns the relevant VehicleClassGroup or throws a DtaError if not found.

iterVehicleClassGroups()¶

Return an iterator to the vehicle class group items

iterVehicleClassNames()¶

Return an iterator to the vehicle classes

maxVehicleLength()¶

Returns the maximum vehicle length, in VehicleType.LENGTH_UNITS

vehicleClassGroups = None¶

vehicle class group name (string) -> VehicleClassGroup

vehicleClassNames = None¶

list of Vehicle Class Names

vehicleTypes = None¶

list of instances of VehicleType
